biocontainers.name: rawtools
biocontainers.summary: RawTools is an open-source and freely available package designed to perform scan data parsing and quantification, and quality control analysis of Thermo Orbitrap raw mass spectrometer files.

biotools.summary: A standalone tool for extracting data directly from raw files generated by Thermo Orbitrap family instruments.

bioschemas.name: RawTools
bioschemas.summary: A standalone tool for extracting data directly from raw files generated by Thermo Orbitrap family instruments.
